languages.text: "У нас, значит, небо закрыто, бунтовщики сбивают все, что летает, а вы сели прямо в наш тыл, целые и не поцарапанные?! Да еще и на таком шаттле... Откуда шаттл? Из дворца угнали?!" {n}Вояка не без трепета взирает на ваш сияющий золотом транспорт.{/n} "Вяжи их, парни, повстанцы нам десант забросили!"

"All right, so our skies are in lockdown, the rebels are shooting down anything that flies, and you lot just happened to land in our rear without a scratch to show for it? And on a shuttle like that... Where did you get it? Stolen from the palace, isn't it?" {n}He is visibly awed by the resplendent gold of your transport.{/n} "Grab 'em, lads, we've got ourselves a rebel landing force!"
languages.original_text: "У нас, значит, небо закрыто, бунтовщики сбивают все, что летает, а вы сели прямо в наш тыл, целые и не поцарапанные?! Да еще и на таком шаттле... Откуда шаттл? Из дворца угнали?!" {n}Вояка не без трепета взирает на ваш сияющий золотом транспорт.{/n} "Вяжи их, парни, повстанцы нам десант забросили!"

And on a shuttle like that... Where did you get it? Stolen from the palace, isn't it?" {n}He is visibly awed by the resplendent gold of your transport.{/n} "Grab 'em, lads, we've got ourselves a rebel landing force!"

languages.text: "Also gut, unsere Himmel sind also abgeriegelt, die Rebellen schießen alles ab, was fliegt, und Ihr landet ganz zufällig ohne einen einzigen Kratzer in unserem Rücken? Und in so einem Shuttle ... Woher habt Ihr das? Aus dem Palast gestohlen, oder?" {n}Er ist sichtbar beeindruckt von dem glänzenden Gold deines Schiffs.{/n} "Schnappt sie Euch, Leute, das ist ein Landetrupp der Rebellen!"
languages.original_text: "All right, so our skies are in lockdown, the rebels are shooting down anything that flies, and you lot just happened to land in our rear without a scratch to show for it? And on a shuttle like that... Where did you get it? Stolen from the palace, isn't it?" {n}He is visibly awed by the resplendent gold of your transport.{/n} "Grab 'em, lads, we've got ourselves a rebel landing force!"

traits.locale_text: "Also gut, unsere Himmel sind also abgeriegelt, die Rebellen schießen alles ab, was fliegt, und Ihr landet ganz zufällig ohne einen einzigen Kratzer in unserem Rücken? Und in so einem Shuttle ... Woher habt Ihr das? Aus dem Palast gestohlen, oder?" {n}Er ist sichtbar beeindruckt von dem glänzenden Gold deines Schiffs.{/n} "Schnappt sie Euch, Leute, das ist ein Landetrupp der Rebellen!"

languages.text: « D'accord... Alors, l'espace aérien est bloqué, les rebelles tirent sur tout ce qui vole et vous, vous venez atterrir derrière nos lignes sans une égratignure ! Et dans ce genre de navette, en plus... Où vous avez dégoté un vaisseau pareil ? Vous l'avez piqué au palais, c'est ça ? » {n}Visiblement, les dorures clinquantes de votre navette l'impressionnent.{/n} « Chopez-les, les gars ! Ça ne peut être que des rebelles ! »
languages.original_text: "All right, so our skies are in lockdown, the rebels are shooting down anything that flies, and you lot just happened to land in our rear without a scratch to show for it? And on a shuttle like that... Where did you get it? Stolen from the palace, isn't it?" {n}He is visibly awed by the resplendent gold of your transport.{/n} "Grab 'em, lads, we've got ourselves a rebel landing force!"

traits.locale_text: « D'accord... Alors, l'espace aérien est bloqué, les rebelles tirent sur tout ce qui vole et vous, vous venez atterrir derrière nos lignes sans une égratignure ! Et dans ce genre de navette, en plus... Où vous avez dégoté un vaisseau pareil ? Vous l'avez piqué au palais, c'est ça ? » {n}Visiblement, les dorures clinquantes de votre navette l'impressionnent.{/n} « Chopez-les, les gars ! Ça ne peut être que des rebelles ! »

languages.text: “让我看看，天空被封锁了，所有会飞的东西都会被叛军打下来。而你们这些家伙恰好落在我们后方，还没受一点伤？还坐着这样的穿梭机……你是从哪里弄来的？是从宫殿里偷来的，对吧？”{n}很显然，你这架金灿灿的穿梭机让他深感敬畏。{/n}“抓住他们，伙计们！他们是叛徒的登陆部队！”
languages.original_text: "All right, so our skies are in lockdown, the rebels are shooting down anything that flies, and you lot just happened to land in our rear without a scratch to show for it? And on a shuttle like that... Where did you get it? Stolen from the palace, isn't it?" {n}He is visibly awed by the resplendent gold of your transport.{/n} "Grab 'em, lads, we've got ourselves a rebel landing force!"

traits.locale_text: “让我看看，天空被封锁了，所有会飞的东西都会被叛军打下来。而你们这些家伙恰好落在我们后方，还没受一点伤？还坐着这样的穿梭机……你是从哪里弄来的？是从宫殿里偷来的，对吧？”{n}很显然，你这架金灿灿的穿梭机让他深感敬畏。{/n}“抓住他们，伙计们！他们是叛徒的登陆部队！”

languages.text: 「で、この空域は封鎖されていて、反乱軍は空を飛ぶものすべてを撃ち落としているというのに、お前達はたまたま、かすり傷ひとつ負わずに我々の後方に着陸したというのか？そのシャトルは…一体どこで？宮殿から盗んだんだろう？」{n}男は目に見えて、こちらの輸送機のきらびやかなゴールドに驚いている。{/n}「捕まえろ、反乱軍の上陸部隊だ！」
languages.original_text: "All right, so our skies are in lockdown, the rebels are shooting down anything that flies, and you lot just happened to land in our rear without a scratch to show for it? And on a shuttle like that... Where did you get it? Stolen from the palace, isn't it?" {n}He is visibly awed by the resplendent gold of your transport.{/n} "Grab 'em, lads, we've got ourselves a rebel landing force!"

traits.locale_text: 「よし、我々の空は封鎖されている。反乱軍は空を飛ぶものすべてを撃ち落としているというのに、お前達はたまたま、かすり傷ひとつ負わずに我々の後方に着陸したというのか？そのシャトルは…一体どこで？宮殿から盗んだんだろう？」{n}男は目に見えて、こちらの輸送機のきらびやかなゴールドに驚いている。{/n}「みんな、反乱軍の上陸部隊だ！」

languages.text: «Muy bien, así que nuestros cielos están bloqueados, los rebeldes están derribando todo lo que vuela, ¿y acaba de aterrizar en nuestra retaguardia sin un rasguño? Y en una lanzadera como esa... ¿De dónde la ha sacado? Robada del palacio, ¿no?». {n}Está muy asombrado por el resplandeciente oro de tu transporte.{/n} «¡Atrapadlos, muchachos, tenemos una fuerza de desembarco rebelde!».
languages.original_text: "All right, so our skies are in lockdown, the rebels are shooting down anything that flies, and you lot just happened to land in our rear without a scratch to show for it? And on a shuttle like that... Where did you get it? Stolen from the palace, isn't it?" {n}He is visibly awed by the resplendent gold of your transport.{/n} "Grab 'em, lads, we've got ourselves a rebel landing force!"

traits.locale_text: «Muy bien, así que nuestros cielos están bloqueados, los rebeldes están derribando todo lo que vuela, ¿y acaba de aterrizar en nuestra retaguardia sin un rasguño? Y en una lanzadera como esa... ¿De dónde la ha sacado? Robada del palacio, ¿no?». {n}Está muy asombrado por el resplandeciente oro de tu transporte.{/n} «¡Atrapadlos, muchachos, tenemos una fuerza de desembarco rebelde!».

languages.text: "Hava sahası kapalı, isyancılar uçan her şeyi vuruyor, sizse çizik bile almadan arkamıza iniyorsunuz. Hem de böyle bir mekikle... Nereden buldunuz? Saraydan çaldınız, değil mi?" {n}Vasıtandaki ışıldayan altın işlemeden etkilendiği besbelli.{/n} "İsyancılar dibimize çıkarma yapmış millet, yakalayın!"
languages.original_text: "All right, so our skies are in lockdown, the rebels are shooting down anything that flies, and you lot just happened to land in our rear without a scratch to show for it? And on a shuttle like that... Where did you get it? Saraydan çaldınız, değil mi?" {n}Vasıtandaki ışıldayan altın işlemeden etkilendiği besbelli.{/n} "İsyancılar dibimize çıkarma yapmış millet, yakalayın!"
